text: Xinshi buzhi yu shahai xinshi, chufei shi wusha. Shei wusha yige xinshi, shei dang shifang yige xindao de nuli, bing yi xue huan jiaofu shi qin, chufei tamen ziyuan rang yu. Bei sha de xinshi, ruguo ta de zongzu shi nimen de diren, namo, xiongshou yingdang shifang yige xindao de nuli. Ruguo bei sha zhe de zongzu shi nimen de mengyou, namo, xiongshou yingdang yi xue huan jiaofu shi qin, bing shifang yige xindao de nuli. Shei buneng shifang nuli, shei dang bian xu zhaijie liang yue, zhe shi yin wei zhenzhu zhunxu ta huiguo zi xin. Zhenzhu shi quanzhi de, shi zhi rui de.
